songs.title: Worldwide (Episode Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1: James and Logan]
Wait a minute
Before you tell me anything, how was your day?
Cause I've been missing
(You by my side, yeah)
It ain't easy
To keep on moving city to city
Just get up and go
(The show must go on, so I need you to be strong)

[Pre-Chorus: Carlos and Logan]
I'm never, never
(Never as far away as it may seem, oh)
Soon we'll be together
We'll pick up right where we left of

[Hook: James, Kendall, Logan]
(Hello, tuck you in every night on the phone)
(Hello, tuck you in every night)
And I can hardly take another goodbye
Baby, won't be long
You're the one that I'm waiting on
(Hello, tuck you in every night on the phone, woah)
Girl I'll be thinking about you worldwide, worldwide, worldwide
Girl I'll be thinking about you worldwide, worldwide, worldwide
(Girl I'll be thinking about you)

[Bridge: Carlos and James]
Oh, wherever the wind blows me
Yes you're still the one and only girl on my mind

[Hook: James and Logan]
Paris, London, Tokyo
There's just one thing that I gotta do
(Hello, tuck you in every night on the phone) (Yeah)
Girl I'll be thinking about you worldwide, worldwide, worldwide
(Girl I'll be thinking about you)

[Outro: Logan and Kendall]
Yes
I may meet a million pretty girls that know my name
But don't you worry
Cause you have my heart
